item.title: Reinforcement Learning with LTL and ⍵-Regular Objectives via Optimality-Preserving Translation to Average Rewards
item.description: Reinforcement learning with complex objectives made easy: This paper introduces an optimality-preserving translation to reduce problems with Linear Temporal Logic (LTL) objectives to standard average …
